description: representing a log entry for an event

origin.description: a value that identifies the component where the event has been created

referenceType.description: describing the content of the reference value

reference.description: value that identifies an entity or addressee or allows assumptions by equivalence

context.description: object containing properties that are related to the process where the event happened

creationDateTime.description: value representing the date-time when the eventlog entry was created

expirationDateTime.description: value representing the date-time when the eventlog entry is becoming irrelevant for processes, analytics or legal
